dc.title: Communications Engineering Branch Homepage
dc.description: Welcome to the Communications Engineering Branch of the Lister Hill National Center for Biomedical Communications at the National Library of Medicine. Research focus: biomedical image processing, document image analysis and understanding, automated extraction of bibliographic data from journals, content-based image indexing.
